title: Division
text: Remember that $$\frac{f}{g}$$ is the same as $$\frac{f}{g} x$$. All we have to do is divide the two functions.

title: Division
text: Let's start by putting the equation in fractional form, $$\frac{2x^2+4x}{12x}$$,

title: Division
text: Now, we can factor out $$2x$$ from the numerator and denominator: $$\frac{2x\left(x+2\right)}{2x\times6}$$.

title: Division
text: The $$2x$$ in the numerator and denominatory cancel each other out, so we are left with $$\frac{x+2}{6}$$.
